title: Tesla asked Canada for lower tariff on China-made EVs, government source says
description: Canada has announced a 100% duty on Chinese-made electric vehicles, impacting companies like Tesla. The move follows the United States' lead and targets China's state-directed policy of over-capacity. Tesla had earlier requested a lower tariff similar to the EU's, but Canada has not adjusted its stance. Other automakers are assessing the impact.
